section.p: The Nomad’s Rest costs you 1 Shard a day. Each day you spend here, you can recover 1 Stamina point if injured, up to the limit of your normal unwounded Stamina score.

You hear a fireside tale about a tomb-robber who tried his luck at looting the City of Ruins, an ancient Shadar capital. He carried a flag or banner of the Shadar, and this was some protection - but not enough, for he was driven quite mad by the gibbering ghosts that are said to inhabit the ruin.
